==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きゅう|ふ|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きゅうふ}}

# [[payment]], [[benefit]]
# [[performance]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|給付金}} (''kyūfukin''): payment
* {{l|ja|遺族給付}} (''izoku kyūfu''): survivor's benefit
* {{l|ja|現物給付}} (''genbutsu kyūfu''): benefit in kind
* {{l|ja|失業給付}} (''shitsugyō kyūfu''): unemployment benefit
* {{l|ja|退職給付}} (''taishoku kyūfu''): accrued benefit, retirement benefits
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|反対給付}} (''hontai kyūfu''): performance in return, quid pro quo
* {{l|ja|死亡給付金}} (''shibō kyūfukin''): death benefit
* {{l|ja|定額給付金}} (''teigaku kyūfukin''): money handout to stimulate the economy
* {{l|ja|確定給付型年金}} (''kakutei kyūfugata nenkin''): defined-benefit pension
* {{l|ja|育児休業基本給付金}} (''ikuji kyūgyō kihon kyūfukin''): basic allowance of child care leave benefits
{{bottom}}
